<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deadly Simplicity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4642) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
deity with a simple or unarmed attack favored weapon, trained with your deity's favored weapon

</column>

---

When you are wielding your deity’s favored weapon, increase the damage die size of that weapon by one step.

If your deity’s favored weapon is an unarmed attack (such as a fist, if you worship Irori) and its damage die is smaller than d6, instead increase its damage die size to d6.
